data.text:
When life gets tough, music can be a source of comfort and inspiration. For many people, Christian songs hold a special place in their hearts and offer a message of hope and encouragement that can lift their spirits during difficult times. From soulful ballads to uplifting anthems, these songs are filled with messages of faith, strength, and resilience. Whether you’re facing personal struggles or just need a reminder of God’s presence, these songs can be a source of comfort and inspiration. In this article, we’ll be showcasing the top 20 encouraging Christian songs for hard times. Each song on this list has been carefully selected for its uplifting message, powerful vocals, and memorable melody, and is sure to bring comfort and inspiration to anyone who hears it. Whether you’re a long-time fan of Christian music or just looking for a little pick-me-up, these songs are sure to touch your heart and lift your spirits.

1. “How Great is Our God” by Chris Tomlin

“How Great is Our God” by Chris Tomlin is a worshipful ballad that exalts the majesty and grace of the Lord. The song reflects on God’s creation and power, as well as His love for humanity. The lyrics evoke images of mountains rising and oceans roaring, which serve as metaphors for the awe-inspiring power and glory of the Almighty. The chorus, with its uplifting and joyful melody, repeats the refrain “How great is our God, sing with me, how great is our God.” This repetition reinforces the central message of the song – the greatness of our God and our need to sing his praises. The song is a reminder that no matter what happens in our lives, God is always there, and His love and power never diminish. This song is a powerful anthem that inspires listeners to seek a deeper relationship with the Lord and to glorify His name in all they do.

2. “Do it again” by Elevation Worship

“Do it Again” by Elevation Worship is a high-energy, upbeat song that expresses the power of faith and the confidence that comes from trusting in God’s plans. The song opens with a driving beat and powerful vocals that invite listeners to join in declaring their faith. The lyrics are a celebration of God’s faithfulness, and the chorus repeats the phrase “Do it again” as a declaration of the belief that God will continue to work miracles in people’s lives. The song speaks to the idea that even when we experience moments of doubt, God is always there and always ready to show His power. This song is a rallying cry for believers everywhere, reminding us that with faith and trust, we can achieve great things in our lives and in the world around us. Whether you’re feeling low or full of faith, “Do it Again” is an inspiring anthem that will lift you up and fill you with hope.

3. “Trust in You” by Lauren Daigle

“Trust in You” by Lauren Daigle is a heartfelt ballad that speaks to the power of faith and the peace that comes from trusting in God. The song’s introspective lyrics explore the journey of surrendering control and placing all trust in the Lord, even when life is uncertain. With its powerful, emotive vocals and gentle instrumentation, “Trust in You” captures the essence of a deep, intimate relationship with God. The chorus repeats the phrase “I will trust in You,” which serves as a declaration of faith and commitment to the Lord. This song is a reminder that no matter what life brings, God is always there to provide comfort, guidance, and strength. Whether you’re facing a difficult challenge or simply seeking a deeper connection with the divine, “Trust in You” is a powerful anthem of faith that will uplift and encourage you on your journey.

4. “There Was Jesus” by Zach Williams, Dolly Parton

“There Was Jesus” by Zach Williams and Dolly Parton is a touching duet that celebrates the transformative power of faith. The song speaks to the idea that even in the darkest moments of life, there is always hope because of Jesus. With its blend of country and contemporary Christian music styles, “There Was Jesus” is a moving tribute to the transformative power of faith. The lyrics reflect on the idea that no matter what life brings, there is always hope because of Jesus. The chorus repeats the refrain “There was Jesus,” emphasizing the central message of the song – that in every moment of darkness and uncertainty, there is the light of Jesus to guide us. The collaboration between Zach Williams and Dolly Parton brings together two of the biggest voices in Christian and country music, creating a powerful and uplifting song that will inspire and encourage listeners. Whether you’re seeking hope and comfort or simply looking to deepen your faith, “There Was Jesus” is an anthem of hope that will move and inspire you.

5. “Blessings” by Laura Story

“Blessings” by Laura Story is a powerful ballad that explores the idea that sometimes, life’s greatest challenges can bring us the greatest blessings. The song speaks to the power of faith and the belief that even when things seem difficult or unfair, God is always at work, bringing good out of even the most challenging situations. With its gentle instrumentation and tender vocals, “Blessings” captures the essence of this powerful message. The lyrics reflect on the idea that even when we’re facing tough times, we can trust that God is working for our good and blessing us in ways we might not even realize. The chorus repeats the phrase “What if your blessings come through raindrops,” emphasizing the central message of the song – that God’s blessings often come in unexpected and challenging ways. Whether you’re facing difficult times or simply seeking inspiration and encouragement, “Blessings” is a powerful anthem of hope and faith that will lift you up and fill you with peace.

6. “Sweetly Broken” by Jeremy Riddle

“Sweetly Broken” by Jeremy Riddle is a powerful Christian worship song that expresses the singer’s devotion and surrender to God. The lyrics describe how, in the face of life’s challenges and uncertainties, the singer finds comfort and peace in the knowledge that they are completely in God’s hands. The song features Jeremy’s emotive vocals and a haunting melody that creates a moving and spiritual atmosphere. With its message of surrender and trust, “Sweetly Broken” has become a staple of contemporary Christian worship, inspiring listeners to find comfort in God’s love and to let go of the things that weigh them down. Whether you’re in need of spiritual renewal or just want to be reminded of God’s presence, this song is sure to touch your heart and lift your spirit.

7. “You’re Going to Be OK” by Brian & Jenn Johnson

“You’re Going to Be OK” by Brian & Jenn Johnson is a cheerful, uplifting song that offers comfort and hope to those facing difficult times. The song’s upbeat melody and positive lyrics are a powerful reminder that no matter what life brings, we can trust in God’s love and care. The lyrics reflect on the idea that even when things seem uncertain or overwhelming, God is always there to provide guidance, comfort, and support. The chorus repeats the phrase “You’re going to be OK,” offering a message of hope and reassurance to listeners. Whether you’re facing a personal struggle or simply looking for inspiration and encouragement, “You’re Going to Be OK” is an upbeat and cheerful anthem of hope that will lift you up and fill you with peace. The song is a reminder that no matter what life brings, we can trust in God’s love and care and that everything will be alright in the end.

8. “It Is Well” by Kristene DiMarco & Bethel Music

“It Is Well” by Kristene DiMarco and Bethel Music is a moving ballad that speaks to the power of faith and trust in God, even in the midst of difficult times. The song’s introspective lyrics explore the idea that no matter what life brings, it is possible to find peace and contentment in God. The chorus repeats the phrase “It is well with my soul,” serving as a declaration of faith and trust in God’s love and care. The song’s tender vocals and gentle instrumentation create a powerful atmosphere of peace and comfort, making “It Is Well” an uplifting anthem of hope and faith. The song is based on the hymn of the same name, which was written by Horatio Spafford in response to a series of personal tragedies. Despite the difficult circumstances he faced, Spafford was able to find peace and contentment in God, and his words continue to inspire and encourage listeners today. Whether you’re facing a personal challenge or simply looking to deepen your faith, “It Is Well” is a powerful reminder that no matter what life brings, it is possible to find peace and contentment in God.

9. “Strangely Dim” by Francesca Battistelli

“Strangely Dim” by Francesca Battistelli is a soulful pop-inspired ballad that speaks to the power of hope and redemption. The song’s upbeat melody and positive lyrics are a powerful reminder that no matter what life brings, it is possible to find light and joy in even the darkest of situations. The lyrics reflect on the idea that through faith, it is possible to overcome challenges and find peace and happiness. The chorus repeats the phrase “You make the darkness strangely dim,” emphasizing the central message of the song – that through faith and trust in God, it is possible to find hope and redemption even in the most difficult of times. Whether you’re facing a personal struggle or simply looking for inspiration and encouragement, “Strangely Dim” is an upbeat and cheerful anthem of hope that will lift you up and fill you with peace. The song’s soulful vocals and infectious melody make it an uplifting and powerful reminder of the power of hope and redemption.

10. “God Of All My Days” by Casting Crowns

“God of All My Days” by Casting Crowns is a heartfelt ballad that speaks to the power of faith and trust in God’s love and care. The song’s introspective lyrics explore the idea that by placing our faith in God, we can find peace and contentment in every aspect of our lives. The chorus repeats the phrase “God of all my days,” serving as a declaration of faith and trust in God’s plan for our lives. The song’s tender vocals and gentle instrumentation create a powerful atmosphere of peace and comfort, making “God of All My Days” an uplifting anthem of hope and faith. The song is a reminder that by placing our trust in God, we can find peace and happiness in every aspect of our lives, no matter what challenges we may face. Whether you’re facing a personal struggle or simply looking to deepen your faith, “God of All My Days” is a powerful reminder that no matter what life brings, it is possible to find peace and contentment in God’s love and care.

11. “Way Maker” by Sinach

“Way Maker” by Sinach is an upbeat and joyful gospel song that speaks to the power of faith and trust in God’s love and care. The song’s upbeat melody and positive lyrics are a powerful reminder that no matter what life brings, it is possible to find light and joy in even the darkest of situations. The lyrics reflect on the idea that through faith, it is possible to overcome challenges and find peace and happiness. The chorus repeats the phrase “Way Maker,” emphasizing the central message of the song – that God is always present, making a way for us, even in the most difficult of circumstances. Whether you’re facing a personal struggle or simply looking for inspiration and encouragement, “Way Maker” is an upbeat and cheerful anthem of hope that will lift you up and fill you with peace. The song’s infectious melody and powerful vocals make it an uplifting and powerful reminder of the power of faith and trust in God.

12. “The Perfect Wisdom Of Our God” by Keith & Kristyn Getty

“The Perfect Wisdom of Our God” by Keith & Kristyn Getty is a beautiful hymn that speaks to the majesty and wisdom of God. The song’s elegant melody and tender lyrics offer a powerful reminder of the infinite wisdom and knowledge of our loving God. The lyrics reflect on the idea that no matter what challenges we may face in life, God’s wisdom and love are always present to guide and support us. The chorus repeats the phrase “The perfect wisdom of our God,” serving as a declaration of faith and trust in God’s unwavering love and care. The song’s gentle instrumentation and heartfelt vocals create a powerful atmosphere of peace and comfort, making “The Perfect Wisdom of Our God” a moving and uplifting hymn of hope and faith. Whether you’re facing a personal struggle or simply looking to deepen your faith, this beautiful song is a powerful reminder of the majesty and wisdom of God and the peace that can be found in His love and care.

13. “Amazing Grace (My Chains Are Gone)” by BYU Noteworthy

“Amazing Grace (My Chains Are Gone)” by BYU Noteworthy is a powerful and emotional rendition of the beloved hymn “Amazing Grace.” The song’s introspective lyrics and beautiful melody reflect on the idea of finding freedom and redemption through faith in God’s love and grace. The lyrics speak of being “lost” but “found” and “blind” but “now I see,” emphasizing the transformative power of God’s love and grace. The chorus repeats the phrase “My chains are gone,” serving as a declaration of the freedom and liberation that can be found in God’s grace. The song’s moving vocals and powerful instrumentation create a powerful atmosphere of peace and comfort, making “Amazing Grace (My Chains Are Gone)” an emotional and uplifting anthem of hope and faith. Whether you’re facing a personal struggle or simply looking for inspiration and encouragement, this beautiful song is a powerful reminder of the transformative power of God’s love and grace.

14. “King Of The World” by Natalie Grant

“King of the World” by Natalie Grant is a powerful and uplifting worship song that declares the greatness and majesty of God. The song’s energetic melody and triumphant lyrics offer a joyful celebration of God’s sovereignty and power. The lyrics speak of God as the “King of the World,” who holds all things in His hands and rules over all with love and grace. The chorus repeats the phrase “You are the King of the World,” serving as a declaration of faith and trust in God’s rule and reign. The song’s upbeat instrumentation and passionate vocals create a celebratory atmosphere, making “King of the World” a joyful and inspiring worship song. Whether you’re looking for a song of encouragement and hope or simply looking to celebrate the majesty of God, this powerful song is sure to uplift and inspire.

15. “Overcomer” by Mandisa

“Overcomer” by Mandisa is an uplifting and powerful gospel song that encourages listeners to persevere through challenges and difficulties. The lyrics talk about how, with the help of faith and determination, one can overcome any obstacle and come out stronger on the other side. The upbeat melody, combined with Mandisa’s powerful vocals, creates a feel-good atmosphere that is sure to lift the spirits of anyone who hears it. The song has become a fan favorite and an anthem for hope, reminding listeners that they are not alone and that they have the strength to overcome any challenge that comes their way.

16. “Hills and Valleys” by Tauren Wells

“Hills and Valleys” by Tauren Wells is a contemporary Christian song that explores the ups and downs of life. The lyrics describe how God is present with us through every high and low, guiding and sustaining us through every step of our journey. The song features an inspiring message of hope, reminding listeners that they are not alone and that they can trust in God’s love and care, no matter what challenges they may face. With its powerful vocals, emotionally charged lyrics, and memorable melody, “Hills and Valleys” is a standout song that resonates with audiences of all ages and backgrounds. Whether you’re experiencing the peaks or the valleys of life, this song is sure to bring comfort and encouragement.

17. “Keep Fighting the Good Fight” by Unspoken

“Keep Fighting the Good Fight” by Unspoken is a rock-infused Christian song that encourages listeners to keep pushing forward, no matter what obstacles they may encounter. The lyrics talk about perseverance and never giving up, even when things seem tough. The upbeat melody, combined with the band’s high-energy performance, creates a powerful and motivational atmosphere that is sure to inspire and uplift anyone who hears it. The song has become a fan favorite and a rallying cry for anyone facing challenges, reminding listeners that they have the strength to overcome and the courage to keep fighting for what they believe in. With its message of hope and determination, “Keep Fighting the Good Fight” is a song that will stay with you long after the music stops.

18. “All My Hope” by Crowder

“All My Hope” by Crowder is a soulful and powerful Christian song that expresses the singer’s complete reliance on God. The lyrics describe how, in the face of life’s challenges and uncertainties, the singer places all of their hope and trust in the Lord. The song features a blend of gospel and contemporary elements, including soulful vocals, intricate harmonies, and an upbeat melody that creates a moving and uplifting atmosphere. With its message of unwavering faith and devotion, “All My Hope” has become a staple of contemporary Christian music, inspiring and encouraging listeners to cling to hope and to find peace in the love and care of God. Whether you’re facing a difficult situation or just need a reminder of God’s presence, this song is sure to bring comfort and inspiration.

19. “Chain Breaker” by Zach Williams

“Chain Breaker” by Zach Williams is a powerful Christian ballad that explores the themes of freedom and liberation. The lyrics describe how, through faith in Jesus, anyone can break free from the chains that bind them, whether it be addiction, fear, or any other form of oppression. The song features emotive vocals, gentle guitar, and a haunting melody that creates a moving and poignant atmosphere. With its message of hope and redemption, “Chain Breaker” has become a fan favorite, inspiring listeners to find the courage to break free from whatever may be holding them back and to trust in the power of God’s love to heal and transform. Whether you’re looking for comfort in the face of difficulty or simply need a reminder of God’s presence, this song is sure to touch your heart and lift your spirits.

20. “Tell Your Heart To Beat Again” by Danny Gokey

“Tell Your Heart to Beat Again” by Danny Gokey is a touching and uplifting Christian ballad that encourages listeners to find the strength to move forward and start anew, even after experiencing heartbreak and disappointment. The lyrics talk about the power of hope and the transformative impact it can have on one’s life, inspiring listeners to open their hearts and embrace a brighter future. The song features Danny’s powerful vocals and an emotive melody that creates a moving and memorable atmosphere. With its message of healing and renewal, “Tell Your Heart to Beat Again” has become a fan favorite, inspiring listeners to find hope and to keep their hearts beating, no matter what life may bring. Whether you’re in need of encouragement or just want to be reminded of God’s love, this song is sure to touch your heart and lift your spirits.
